alert.note: Alert for Warren (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 03 at 3:23AM EST until January 03 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 AM CST/630 AM EST/ EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of WEST CENTRAL Kentucky, including the following counties, Hardin, Grayson, Butler, Edmonson and Warren. * WHEN...Until 530 AM CST /630 AM EST/. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 222 AM CST /322 AM EST/, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Elizabethtown, Leitchfield, Morgantown, Lee, Clarkson, Sonora, Woodbury, Sadler, South and Prosperity. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
